name: Freedom, stealth mode, detect mode and movement
author: Orion

posts.author: Orion
posts.content:
Usually when stealth mode and detect mode are used together, movement speed is decreased very substantially (50% of walking speed)
Whereas if one or the other is used, the movement speed is that of normal walking if not encumbered.

This is the table from Wiki: Movement rate
Situation Effective movement speed Run?
normal 100% yes
active detect or stealth 100% no
lightly-encumbered 75% no
two of: stealth, detect,
and lightly-encumbered		 50% no
heavily-encumbered 50% no
stealth, detect, and lightly-
encumbered		 25% no
stealth or detect,
and heavily-encumbered		 25% no
stealth, detect, and heavily-encumbered 12% no

I have found when freedom is active, I can use both stealth mode and detect mode together, and move at the same speed as when I use stealth mode (or detect mode) alone ie normal walking speed. This is for both non-monks and monks.
Anyone else notice this? I was wondering if this is an environment factor where I playtest?

I have looked at quite a few wiki pages for information (Freedom, Talk:Freedom, Freedom of Movement, Movement Speed Decrease, Movement Rate, Talk:Movement rate, Stealth, Talk:Stealth, Detect, Talk:Detect).

The best I can come up with is that freedom prevents movement speed decreases but detect/stealth mode doesn't allow for running.

Also curious as to what happens if I am encumbered with freedom. Will I be walking at normal speed, or a decreased movement speed + walking? 
I will be more observant but maybe others know the answer to this.

posts.author: gkorjax
posts.content: I have noticed this and use it extensively. Either a ring of freedom of movement, or I use the spell of the same name from a scroll or staff /etc. Very handy. I play in the same environment as you. I don't know if works elsewhere.

posts.author: Zanithar
posts.content:
I also have noticed this, I assumed it was working as intended and never looked into it in detail. I use it all the time to counter over-encumbrance. You move pretty slow when your are 2000lbs over your limit and walking speed with Freedom of Movement up.
